message.welcome: Glad to see you!!!😊 I'm a bot that knows a lot of interesting things about cryptocurrencies.💸I can show you current rates, exchanges and general market information.🏦I'm still learning so later I will be able to do more things ✌🏻
message.coins_title: ⬇️ If there is no button with the coin you are looking for, write me and I will try to find it for you. ⬇️
